name: Military_police_officer
text:
Military police officer
An unidentified military police officer was sent to retrieve Major Garland Briggs following his March 1989 disappearance.
Biography
The officer was sent to Twin Peaks, Washington under orders from Colonel Calvin Reilly. His retrieval of Briggs from the Twin Peaks Sheriff's Department was met with protest by Sheriff Harry S. Truman, but the major went with the officer willingly.
